1. Videos

Videos

The Videos page is used to upload and manage videos. The body of the page will list all videos in the account.

Publish videos
  1. Select a video.
  2. Click .
  3. Select a player.
  4. Click the preview link or copy the embed code.
Show me how
Details
Upload videos
  1. Click .
  2. Browse and select videos to upload.
Show me how
Details
Edit video details for multiple videos
  1. Select one or more videos and then click .
  2. Make the appropriate changes.
  3. Click .
Show me how
Details
View video details panel
  1. Select a video and then click .

Click the button again to close the panel.

Add video to a folder
  1. Select one or more videos.
  2. Click More > Move to Folder.
  3. Select a folder.
  4. Click .
Show me how
Add videos to a manual playlist
  1. Select one or more videos.
  2. Click More > Add to Playlist.
  3. Click on a playlist name.
  4. Click .
Activate / Deactivate a video
  1. Select one or more videos.
  2. Click More > Activate or Deactivate.
Share videos to another account
  1. Select one or more videos.
  2. Click More > Share.
  3. Select an affiliate account to share to.
  4. Click .
Delete videos
  1. Select a video.
  2. Click .
Search videos
  1. Enter search terms and press enter.

The following video fields will be searched:

  • Video ID
  • Name
  • Short description
  • Long description
  • Tags
  • Reference ID
  • Custom fields
Details
Export video metadata
  1. Click .
  2. Select the video data to export.
  3. Click .
Details
Select columns to display
  1. Click .
  2. Select the columns to display.
  3. Click outside the column list to close it.
View video details
  1. Click on a video name to open the Video Details page.
Create folder
  1. In the left navigation, click + Create Folder.
  2. Enter a name for the folder.
  3. Press enter.
Add remote video
  1. Click + Add Remote Video.
  2. Enter the Video Name.
  3. Enter the Video Type and Duration.
  4. Enter the video rendition details.
  5. Click .
